import React, { useContext } from 'react' import './userStyle.css' import { Logout } from './Logout' import { UserContext } from './UserProvider' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Button } from 'react-bootstrap' function UserProfile() { const { currentEmail } = useContext(UserContext) const btnstyle = { marginTop: '8px', marginBottom: '8px' } if (!currentEmail) { return (

Account

You are not loged in.

) } return (

Account

Hi, {currentEmail.email}

) } export default UserProfile
